src: A Franciaország ellen folytatott csata végeztével Németország megkezdte a felkészülést a Brit-sziget megtámadására. Németország a támadásnak az „Oroszlánfóka hadművelet” kódnevet adta. A brit hadsereg nehézfegyverzetének és felszereléseinek nagy része odaveszett, amikor Dunkirkből evakuáltak, tehát a hadsereg meglehetősen gyenge volt. Mindazonáltal a királyi haditengerészet még mindig sokkal erősebb volt, mint a német haditengerészet („Kriegsmarine”) és képes lett volna megsemmisíteni a La Manche-csatornán átkelő bármely megszálló tengeri hadtestet. Ugyanakkor a Királyi Haditengerészetnek csupán nagyon kevés hajója tartózkodott a valószínűsíthető támadási útvonal közelében, mivel a tengernagyok attól tartottak, hogy azok a német légitámadások következtében elsüllyednek.
mt: After the battle against France, Germany began preparing to attack the British Isles. Germany gave the attack the code name Operation Sealion. The British Army had lost most of its heavy weapons and equipment when it was evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was quite weak. Nevertheless, the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (Kriegsmarine) and would have been able to destroy any invading sea force crossing the English Channel. However, the Royal Navy had very few ships in the area of the likely attack route, as the admirals were afraid that they would be sunk by German air attacks.
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: A Franciaország ellen folytatott csata végeztével Németország megkezdte a felkészülést a Brit-sziget megtámadására. Németország a támadásnak az „Oroszlánfóka hadművelet” kódnevet adta. A brit hadsereg nehézfegyverzetének és felszereléseinek nagy része odaveszett, amikor Dunkirkből evakuáltak, tehát a hadsereg meglehetősen gyenge volt. Mindazonáltal a királyi haditengerészet még mindig sokkal erősebb volt, mint a német haditengerészet („Kriegsmarine”) és képes lett volna megsemmisíteni a La Manche-csatornán átkelő bármely megszálló tengeri hadtestet. Ugyanakkor a Királyi Haditengerészetnek csupán nagyon kevés hajója tartózkodott a valószínűsíthető támadási útvonal közelében, mivel a tengernagyok attól tartottak, hogy azok a német légitámadások következtében elsüllyednek.
mt: After the battle against France, Germany began preparing to attack the British Isles. Germany gave the attack the code name Operation Sealion. The British Army had lost most of its heavy weapons and equipment when it was evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was quite weak. Nevertheless, the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (Kriegsmarine) and would have been able to destroy any invading sea force crossing the English Channel. However, the Royal Navy had very few ships in the area of the likely attack route, as the admirals were afraid that they would be sunk by German air attacks.
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: """Kezdjük egy magyarázattal Olaszország terveiről. Olaszország elsősorban Németország és Japán """"kistestvére"""" volt."" Gyengébb hadserege és gyengébb haditengerészete volt, habár éppen négy új hajót építettek a háború kezdete előtt. Olaszország fő célja az afrikai országok voltak. Ezen országok elfoglalásához csapatainak szüksége lenne egy kiindulási bázisra, hogy átjuthassanak a Földközi-tengeren és eláraszthassák Afrikát. Ezért meg kellett szabadulniuk a brit bázisoktól és az Egyiptomban tartózkodó hajóktól. Ezeken az akciókon kívül az olasz hadihajóknak semmi egyéb feladatuk nem volt. Ami Japánt illeti, Japán egy szigetország, ahogy Britannia is."
mt: "Let's start with an explanation of Italy's plans. Italy was primarily Germany and Japan's ""little brother"". It had a weaker army and weaker navy, although it was building four new ships before the war began. Italy's main goal was the African countries. To conquer these countries, its troops needed a base to cross the Mediterranean and flood Africa. Therefore, they had to get rid of the British bases and the ships in Egypt. These were the only actions the Italian warships had to perform. As for Japan, Japan is an island country, just like Britain is."
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "A normandiai partraszállás és az ezt követő harcok felszabadították Franciaország északi részét, de a déli rész továbbra sem volt szabad. Ezt a „Vichy” franciák uralták. Ezek francia emberek voltak, akik 1940-ben békét kötöttek a németekkel és a betolakodókkal dolgoztak, ahelyett, hogy harcoltak volna ellenük. ""1940. augusztus 15-én a szövetségesek megszállták Dél-Franciaországot, az inváziónak a „Dragoon hadművelet"""" nevet adták."" Alig két hét alatt az amerikaiak és a szabad francia erők felszabadították Dél-Franciaországot, és Németország felé fordultak."
mt: 1940 August 15, the Allies occupied Southern France, the invasion was called the "Dragoon Operation". In just two weeks, the Americans and the Free French forces liberated Southern France and turned towards Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: A tengeralattjárók víz alatti közlekedésre és hosszú ideig tartó víz alatti tartózkodásra tervezett hajók. Tengeralattjárókat használtak az I. és a II. világháborúban. Akkoriban nagyon lassúak voltak, és nagyon korlátozott volt a lőtávolságuk. A tengeralattjárók a háború elején jellemzően a tenger felszínén közlekedtek, ám ahogy a radarfelderítés egyre fejlettebbé és pontosabbá vált, úgy kényszerültek víz alá merülni, nehogy észrevegyék őket. A német tengeralattjárókat egyszerűen U-Boat-oknak nevezték. A németek rendkívüli jártasságra tettek szert a tengeralattjárók navigálásának és üzemeltetésének terén. A tengeralattjárókkal elért sikereik miatt a háború után a németeknek nem engedték, hogy sokat tartsanak belőlük.
mt: Submarines are designed to operate underwater and to stay submerged for long periods of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. At the beginning of the war, submarines were slow and had a limited range. As radar detection became more sophisticated, submarines were forced to submerge to avoid detection. German submarines were simply called U-Boats. The Germans became very proficient in submarine navigation and operation. Their success with submarines during the war led to the Allies not allowing the Germans to keep many after the war.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: 1939. szeptember 17-én a lengyel védelem már megtört, és az egyetlen remény a román hídfőálláson keresztüli visszavonulás és újraszerveződés volt. Ugyanakkor ezek a tervek szinte egyik napról a másikra idejétmúlttá lettek nyilvánítva, amikor több mint 800 000 katona a szovjet vörös hadseregből belépett és létrehozta a belorusz és ukrán frontokat, miután lerohanták Lengyelország keleti részét, megszegve ezzel a rigai békeszerződést, a szovjet-lengyel megnemtámadási egyezményt és más nemzetközi két- és többoldalú megállapodásokat.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was a withdrawal and reorganization through the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans became obsolete almost overnight when more than 800,000 men from the Red Army entered and created the Belorussian and Ukrainian fronts, after they had overrun the eastern part of Poland, violating the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish non-aggression pact and other bilateral and multilateral agreements.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Már szinte az elejétől rosszul alakultak a dolgok az olaszok számára Észak-Afrikában. Egy héten belül az 1940. június 10-i olasz hadüzenettől a brit 11. huszárezred elfoglalta a líbiai Fort Capuzzót. A Bardiától keletre levő rajtaütés során a britek elfogták a tizedik olasz hadsereg főmérnökét, Lastucci tábornokot. Június 28-án, Tobruk-i leszállása során, baráti tűz ölte meg Italbo Balbo marsall líbiai kormányzót és Mussolini törvényes örökösét.
mt: 1940. június 10-én az olaszok hadüzenetet adtak a brit 11. huszárezrednek, amely elfoglalta a líbiai Fort Capuzzót. A Bardiától keletre levő rajtaütés során a britek elfogták a tizedik olasz hadsereg főmérnökét, Lastucci tábornokot. Június 28-án, Tobruk-i leszállása során, baráti tűz ölte meg Italbo Balbo marsall líbiai kormányzót és Mussolini törvényes örökösét.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: A tibeti Buddhizmus Buddha tanításaira épül, de a szeretet mahayana útjával és sok indiai jóga eredetű technikával lett kibővítve. A tibeti buddhizmus elviekben nagyon egyszerű. Kundalini jóga, meditáció és a mindent átölelő szeretet útja alkotja. A Kundalini jóga segítségével a Kundalini energiát (a megvilágosodás energiáját) jóga testtartások, légzési gyakorlatok, mantrák és vizualizációk ébresztik fel. A tibeti meditáció középpontjában az istenség-jóga áll. Számos istenség vizualizációjával az energiacsatornák kitisztulnak, a csakrák aktiválódnak és az öntudat megvilágosul.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but was expanded with the Mahayana path of love and many Indian yoga techniques. Tibetan Buddhism is very simple in principle. Kundalini yoga, meditation and the all-encompassing path of love make up the whole. Kundalini yoga awakens the Kundalini energy (the energy of enlightenment) with yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The central point of Tibetan meditation is deity yoga. Many deity visualizations purify the energy channels, activate the chakras and the consciousness is enlightened.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: A program helyi idő szerint este 8:30-kor kezdődött (15:00 UTC). Országszerte ismert énekesek adtak elő bhajanokat, azaz vallásos énekeket Shri Shyam lábánál. Sanju Sharma énekes indította az estét, őt követte Jai Shankar Choudhary. pedig a chhappan bhog bhajant adta elő Raju Khandelwal kíséretében. Ezután Lakkha Singh énekelte a bhajanokat. 108 tányér Chhappan Bhogot (a hindu vallásban 56 különféle ehető dolog, amit felajánlanak az istenségnek, pl. édesség, gyümölcs, diófélék, ételek stb. ) szolgáltak fel Baba Shyamnak. Lakkha Singh bemutatta egyben chappan bhog bhadzsánt is. Kísérete Raju Khandelwal énekes volt.
mt: 8:30 pm local time (15:00 UTC) the program began. Nationally known singers performed bhajans, or religious songs, at Shri Shyam's feet. Sanju Sharma began the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. Raju Khandelwal accompanied him. Then Lakkha Singh sang the bhajans. 108 tins of Chhappan Bhog (a Hindu religious offering of 56 different edible things, such as sweets, fruit, nuts, and food) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also performed a chappan bhog bhadjan. Raju Khandelwal was his accompanist.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: Az ünnepséget a Cirque du Soleil világhírű csoport különleges előadásával nyitották meg. Az Isztambuli Állami Szimfonikus Zenekar, egy janicsár katonazenekar, majd Fatih Erkoç és Müslüm Gürses énekesek követték. Utána kerengő dervisek léptek színpadra. A török díva, Sezen Aksu az olasz tenorral, Alessandro Safina-val és a görög énekesnővel, Haris Alexiou-val lépett fel. Befejezésül a Fire of Anatolia török táncegyüttes  mutatta be a „Trója” című előadást.
mt: The ceremony was opened by a special performance by the Cirque du Soleil group. The Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a janissary military band, and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses followed. Then whirling dervishes took the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The Fire of Anatolia Turkish dance ensemble closed the ceremony with the "Trojan" performance.
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Az utasoknak vizet adtak, miközben a 32 fokban várakoztak. ""Scott Kouns tűzoltóparancsnok elmondása szerint """"Forró nap volt Santa Clarában, 90°F feletti hőmérsékletekkel."" ""A hullámvasúton ragadva eltöltött bármilyen hosszú idő enyhén szólva is kellemetlen, de még az is legalább egy órába telt, mire az első személy kikerült onnan. """""""
mt: "Passengers were given water while waiting in 32 degree heat. """"Scott Kouns fire chief said """"It was a hot day in Santa Clarita, with temperatures over 90 degrees."" ""Being stuck on a roller coaster for any length of time is uncomfortable at best, but it took at least an hour for the first person to get off of it. """""""
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: A legfrissebb közlemény szerint a tengerszint mérései szökőárat jeleztek. Pago Pago és Niue közelében határozottan szökőár tevékenységet rögzítettek. Tongában nem jelentettek anyagi kárt vagy súlyos sérülést, de az áramellátás ideiglenesen szünetelt, ami állítólag megakadályozta a tongai hatóságokat abban, hogy a PTWC által kiadott cunami-viharjelzés elérjen hozzájuk. Hawaii tizennégy tengerparti vagy annak közelében lévő iskolája egész szerdán zárva volt a figyelmeztetések feloldása ellenére.
mt: The latest reports indicate that tidal gauges recorded a tsunami. A definite tsunami event was recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. In Tonga, there were no reports of material damage or serious injury, but the power was temporarily interrupted, which apparently prevented the Tongan authorities from receiving the PTWC tsunami warning. Fourteen schools on the Hawaiian coast or near the coast were closed on Wednesday despite the cancellation of the warnings.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, az A1GP Új-Zéland csapat navigátora ma történelmet írt azzal, hogy a 48 éves új-Zélandi Auckland Harbour Bridge-en a leggyorsabban hajtott át. Reid úr hét alkalommal hajtott át a hídon 160 km/h feletti sebességgel az új-zélandi A1GP új autójával, a Black Beauty-val. Az új-zélandi rendőröknek gondot okozott traffipax-szal bemérni Mr Reid sebességét a Black Beauty (Fekete Szépség) alacsony fekvése miatt. Egyetlen alkalommal sikerült őt bemérni, amikor lelassított 160 km/h-ra.
mt: 48-year-old Jonny Reid, navigator for the New Zealand A1GP team, made history today by driving across the Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand at the fastest speed ever recorded. Reid drove the New Zealand A1GP's new car, the Black Beauty, seven times across the bridge at speeds over 160 km/h. The New Zealand police had trouble measuring Mr. Reid's speed with a traffipax due to the Black Beauty's low profile. They were only able to measure him once, when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Hétfőn d.e. 10:08 órakor mérsékelt földrengés rázta meg Nyugat-Montanát. Nem érkezett azonnali jelentés a károkról az Egyesült Államok Geológiai Szolgálatához (USGS) sem a Nemzeti Földrengés Információs Központhoz. A földrengés középpontja kb. 20 km-re (15 mérföldre) északkeletre volt Dillontól és körülbelül 65 km-re (40 mérföldre) délre Butte-től.
mt: 10:08 a.m. local time on Monday, a moderate earthquake shook Western Montana. No immediate reports of damage were received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) or the National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake's epicenter was about 20 km (15 miles) northeast of Dillon and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Az iraki Abu Ghraib börtönt egy lázadás során felgyújtották. A börtön akkor vált hírhedté, amikor a foglyok bántalmazása nyilvánvalóvá vált, miután amerikai erők átvették az irányítást.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was set ablaze during a riot. The prison became notorious when the abuse of prisoners became apparent after American forces took control.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: A zenekar törölte a fellépést a Maui Háborús Emlékstadionnál, melyre 9000 embert vártak, és elnézést kért rajongóitól. A zenekar menedzsmentje – a HK Management Inc. – kezdetben nem indokolta meg, amikor szeptember 20-án lemondták a bulit, másnap azonban logisztikai okokra hivatkoztak.
mt: The band canceled a performance at the Maui War Memorial Stadium, which was expected to draw 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management – HK Management Inc. – initially did not explain when they canceled the show on September 20, but the next day cited logistical reasons.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: A széles körű fosztogatás a jelentések szerint egy éjszakán keresztül folytatódott, mivel a rendfenntartók nem voltak jelen Biskek utcáin. Bishkek az „anarchia” állapotába süllyedt az egyik megfigyelő szerint, amint emberek tömegei barangoltak az utcákon és fosztogatták az áruházakat. Számos bishkeki lakos a délről érkező tüntetőket hibáztatta a törvénytelenségért.
mt: The widespread looting is reported to have continued through the night as police were not present on Bishkek streets. Bishkek has descended into "anarchy" according to one observer as crowds of people roamed the streets and looted shops. Many Bishkek residents blamed the rioters from the south for the lawlessness.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Korábban a Ring vezérigazgatója, Jamie Siminoff megjegyezte, hogy a cég akkor indult, amikor a kapucsengőt nem lehetett hallani a garázsban lévő műhelyéből. Megoldásként készített egy wifis kapucsengőt. Siminoff szerint az eladások növekedtek, miután 2013-ban szerepelt egy Shark Tank epizódban, ahol a befektetők elutasították a startup finanszírozását. 2017 vége felé Siminoff megjelent a QVC vásárlási televíziós csatornán. A Ring a konkurens biztonsági cég, az ADT Corporation ellen is keresetet nyújtott be.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff noted that the company was founded when the garage door opener could not be heard in the workshop. As a solution, he made a Wi-Fi doorbell. Siminoff said sales increased after appearing in a Shark Tank episode in 2013, where investors rejected the startup's financing. At the end of 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping television channel. Ring also filed a lawsuit against the security company competitor, ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: A PBS show két tucatnál is több Emmy-díjat nyert, és csak a Szezám utca vagy a Mister Rogers' Neighborhood futott hosszabb ideig. A műsor minden epizódja egy témára koncentrál egy adott könyvből, melyet több történettel is elemzünk. Minden műsorban volt könyvajánló is a gyerekeknek olyan könyvekről, amelyeket az iskolai könyvtárban megtalálhattak. John Grant, a buffalói WNED csatorna (aReading Rainbow-t sugárzó csatorna) műsorigazgatója szerint „”a Reading Rainbow megtanította a gyerekeket arra, hogy miért érdemes olvasni... az olvasás szeretetére — [a műsor] arra ösztönözte őket, hogy könyvet vegyenek a kezükbe és olvassanak.” Egyesek úgy gondolják – többek közt John Grant is –, hogy  mind a finanszírozásbeli megszorítások, mind az oktatási televíziós műsorok filozófiájában bekövetkezett változások hozzájárultak a sorozat lezárásához.
mt: The PBS show won more than a dozen Emmys, and only Sesame Street or Mister Rogers' Neighborhood ran longer. Each episode focused on a single book, which was then analyzed through multiple stories. Every episode also included a book recommendation for children to find in their school library. John Grant, the Buffalo-based WNED station (the Reading Rainbow's station) program director said, "The Reading Rainbow taught children why it's important to read... it inspired them to pick up a book and read." Some, including John Grant, believe that both budgetary constraints and changes in the philosophy of educational television contributed to the show's cancellation.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Amszterdam városának és az Anne Frank Múzeumnak tisztviselői azt állítják, hogy a fa gombával fertőzött, és közegészségügyi veszélyt jelent, mivel állításuk szerint fennáll a kidőlés közvetlen veszélye. A tervek szerint kedden vágták volna ki, de a bíróság rendkívüli döntése megmentette ettől.
mt: Officials from the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum claim the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health risk, as they say there is an immediate danger of it falling. The plans were to cut it down on Tuesday, but a court's extraordinary decision saved it from that fate.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Az Állatok Felszabadítása szervezet és az Állatokkal szembeni kegyetlenség megelőzésére szolgáló királyi társaság (RSPCA) ismét felszólalt annak érdekében, hogy kötelezővé tegyék minden ausztrál vágóhídon a megfigyelő kamerák felszerelését. Az RSPCA New South Wales főinspektora, David O'Shannessy úgy nyilatkozott az ABC-nek, hogy a vágóhidak ellenőrzése és felülvizsgálata mindennapos dolog kellene, hogy legyen Ausztráliában. „A CCTV minden bizonyal hatékony figyelmeztetés lenne az ott dolgozó embereknek, hogy az állatok jóléte kiemelt fontosságú.”
mt: The Animal Liberation Front and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) have again called for mandatory CCTV cameras to be installed on all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that regular inspections and audits of abattoirs should be the norm in Australia. "CCTV would be a powerful deterrent to staff that the welfare of animals is paramount."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Az Állatok Felszabadítása szervezet és az Állatokkal szembeni kegyetlenség megelőzésére szolgáló királyi társaság (RSPCA) ismét felszólalt annak érdekében, hogy kötelezővé tegyék minden ausztrál vágóhídon a megfigyelő kamerák felszerelését. Az RSPCA New South Wales főinspektora, David O'Shannessy úgy nyilatkozott az ABC-nek, hogy a vágóhidak ellenőrzése és felülvizsgálata mindennapos dolog kellene, hogy legyen Ausztráliában. „A CCTV minden bizonyal hatékony figyelmeztetés lenne az ott dolgozó embereknek, hogy az állatok jóléte kiemelt fontosságú.”
mt: The Animal Liberation Front and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) have again called for mandatory CCTV cameras to be installed on all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that regular inspections and audits of abattoirs should be the norm in Australia. "CCTV would be a powerful deterrent to staff that the welfare of animals is paramount."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Ma, miközben Jeff Weise és a kilenc közüli három áldozat temetésére sor került, elterjedt a hír a Red Lake-i közösségben, hogy egy újabb diákot tartóztattak le a március 21-i iskolai lövöldözés kapcsán. A hatóságok kevés hivatalos kijelentést tettek a mai letartóztatás megerősítésén kívül. A nyomozást ismerő forrás azonban azt mondta a Minneapolis Star-Tribune-nak, hogy Louis Jourdain, a Red Lake Törzs elnökének, Floyd Jourdain-nek a 16 éves fia volt. Jelenleg nem lehet tudni, hogy milyen vádakat terjesztenek elő, vagy mi vezette a hatóságokat a fiúhoz, de a fiatalkorúak elleni eljárás megkezdődött a szövetségi bíróságon.
mt: Today, as the funeral for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims was held, the news spread through the Red Lake community that another student had been arrested in connection with the March 21 school shooting. Authorities have made few official statements beyond confirming the arrest. However, a source familiar with the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that Louis Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain, was the one arrested. It is not known what charges are being brought or what led authorities to the boy, but proceedings have begun in federal juvenile court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: A tüntetés szervezői szerint körülbelül 100,000 ember tüntetett olyan német városokban, mint Berlin, Köln, Hamburg és Hannover. A rendőrség becslése szerint Berlinben 6500-an tüntettek. Emellett tiltakozások voltak Párizsban, Bulgáriában Szófiában, Litvániában Vilniusban, Máltán Valettában, Észtországban Tallinnban, Skóciában Edinburgh-ban és Glasgow-ban is. Londonban körülbelül 200 ember tiltakozott néhány jelentős szerzői jogot birtokló iroda előtt. Az elmúlt hónapban nagyszabású tiltakozások voltak Lengyelországban - mivel az ország csatlakozott az ACTA egyezményhez - melynek hatására a lengyel kormány úgy döntött, egyelőre nem ratifikálja a megállapodást. Lettország és Szlovákia egyaránt elhalasztotta az ACTA-hoz való csatlakozást.
mt: 100,000 people protested in cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover, according to organizers. Police estimated 6,500 people in Berlin. Protests were also held in Paris, Bulgaria in Sofia, Lithuania in Vilnius, Malta in Valetta, Estonia in Tallinn, Scotland in Edinburgh and Glasgow. About 200 people protested outside several major copyright holding companies in London. Large protests were held in Poland in the past month, as the country joined the ACTA agreement, causing the Polish government to decide to not ratify the agreement for now. Latvia and Slovakia also postponed joining the ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Körülbelül 60 olyan esetről számoltak ahol a hibásan működő iPodok túlmelegedtek, összesen hat tűzesetet okozva, és négy embert kisebb égési sérülésekkel károsítva. A japán Gazdasági, Kereskedelmi és Ipari Minisztérium (METI) elmondta, hogy 27, az eszközökkel kapcsolatos balesetről volt tudomása. Az elmúlt héten a METI bejelentette, hogy az Apple 34 további túlhevüléses esetről tájékoztatta, amelyet a vállalat „nem súlyosnak” nevezett. ""A minisztérium válaszában """"őszintén sajnálatosnak"""" nevezte az Apple bejelentésének elnapolását."""
mt: "About 60 cases of iPods overheating were reported, causing six fires and injuring four people with minor burns. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it was aware of 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week, the METI announced that Apple had notified it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called "not serious." "The ministry called Apple's delay in reporting the incidents ""disappointing."""
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Steve Jobs, az Apple vezérigazgatója az iPhone készüléket a színpadra sétálva és a farmerja zsebéből előhúzva mutatta be. Kétórás beszéde során kijelentette: „Ma az Apple újra feltalálja a telefont. Ma történelmet írunk”.
mt: Steve Jobs, Apple CEO, introduced the iPhone by walking onstage and pulling it out of his jeans pocket. In a two-hour presentation, he said: "Today Apple reinvents the phone. Today we change history."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: A jelenleg szenátori pozíciót betöltő argentin first lady, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner tegnap este La Platában, egy Buenos Airestől 50 kilométerre fekvő városban bejelentette, hogy indul az elnökségért. Kirchner asszony az Argentine Színházban jelentette be szándékát, hogy indul az elnökválasztáson. Ugyanott, ahol a 2005-ös szenátusi kampányát kezdte a Buenos Aires tartomány delegációjának tagjaként.
mt: Argentine first lady, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, announced her candidacy for the presidency last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers from Buenos Aires. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theater, where she began her 2005 Senate campaign as a delegate from the Buenos Aires province.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: "Az ACMA azt is megállapította, hogy a videó interneten történő közvetítése ellenére a Big Brother nem sértette meg az online tartalmak cenzúrájára vonatkozó törvényeket, mivel az adathordozót nem tárolták a Big Brother weboldalán. ""A """"The Broadcasting Services Act"""" előírja az internetes tartalmak szabályozását, viszont ahhoz, hogy valamit internetes tartalomnak lehessen tekinteni, annak fizikailag a szerveren kell tartózkodnia."""
mt: "The ACMA also found that the video's online transmission did not breach the censorship laws for online content, as the data carrier was not stored on the Big Brother website. ""The """"Broadcasting Services Act"""" requires regulation of internet content, but for something to be considered internet content, it must physically reside on the server."""
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Peter Costello, az ausztrál kincstárnok, aki várhatóan leváltja majd John Howard miniszterelnököta liberális párt vezetőjeként, az ausztráliai atomenergia-ipart a támogatásáról biztosította. Costello úr szerint, ha a nukleáris energiatermelés  gazdaságilag életképes lesz, akkor Ausztráliának törekednie kell a használatára. „Ha ez forgalmazhatóvá válik, akkor nekünk is kell. Vagyis nincs elvileg kifogás a nukleáris energia ellen” - mondta Costello úr.
mt: Peter Costello, the Australian treasurer, who is expected to replace John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has assured the Australian nuclear industry of its support. Costello said that if nuclear energy becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. "If it becomes marketable, we need it. That is, there is no principled objection to nuclear energy" - Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: A naponta kiosztott mindössze tizennyolc érem miatt számos ország nem jutott éremhez. Közéjük tartozik Hollandia, Anna Jochemsen kilencedik helyezésével a tegnapi női Szuper-G álló osztályában és Finnország, Katja Saarinen tizedik helyével ugyanabban a számban. Az ausztrál Mitchell Gourley tizenegyedik helyen végzett a férfi álló Szuper-G-ben. Oldrich Jelinek cseh versenyző tizenhatodik lett a férfi ülő Szuper-G számban. Arly Velasques Mexikóból lett a férfi ülő Szuper-G tizenötödik helyezettje, míg az új-zélandi Adam Hall kilencedik helyen zárta a férfi ülő Szuper-G versenyt. A lengyelországi látássérült síelő, Maciej Krezel és vezetője, Anna Ogarzynska a tizenharmadik helyet érte el a Super-G versenyen. A dél-koreai Jong Seork Park huszonnegyedik lett a férfiak ülő Super-G versenyén.
mt: 18 medals were awarded daily, so many countries did not get any medals. Among them were the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen's ninth place in yesterday's women's Super-G standing class, and Finland, with Katja Saarinen's tenth place in the same class. The Australian Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Oldrich Jelinek of the Czech Republic finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G, while the New Zealand Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's sitting Super-G. The Polish visually impaired skier, Maciej Krezel and his guide, Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G race. South Korean Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "A tárgyalásra a birminghami királyi bíróságon került sor, és augusztus 3-án zárult le. Az előadó, akit a helyszínen letartóztattak, tagadta a támadást, és azt állította, hogy a rudat a palackok elleni védekezésre használta, amit a közel harminc ember dobált irányába. Blake-et is elítélték az igazságszolgáltatás akadályozására tett kísérlet miatt. ""A bíró azt mondta Blake-nek, hogy „szinte elkerülhetetlen"""" az, hogy börtönbe küldjék."""
mt: "The hearing took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The defendant, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed that he used the rod to defend himself against the bottles thrown at him by about thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to obstruct justice. ""The judge told Blake that it was ""almost inevitable"""" that he would be sent to prison.""
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: "A tárgyalásra a birminghami királyi bíróságon került sor, és augusztus 3-án zárult le. Az előadó, akit a helyszínen letartóztattak, tagadta a támadást, és azt állította, hogy a rudat a palackok elleni védekezésre használta, amit a közel harminc ember dobált irányába. Blake-et is elítélték az igazságszolgáltatás akadályozására tett kísérlet miatt. ""A bíró azt mondta Blake-nek, hogy „szinte elkerülhetetlen"""" az, hogy börtönbe küldjék."""
mt: "The hearing took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The defendant, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed that he used the rod to defend himself against the bottles thrown at him by about thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to obstruct justice. ""The judge told Blake that it was ""almost inevitable"""" that he would be sent to prison.""
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Balin a napirend további pontjai a világ megmaradt erdőinek védelme és a technológiák megosztása, hogy segítsük a fejlődő nemzetek növekedését kevésbé szennyező módszerekkel. Az ENSZ azt is reméli, hogy létre tud hozni egy alapot, amely a globális felmelegedés által érintett országok számára segítséget nyújthat a hatások kezelésében. A pénzt árvízálló házakra, jobb vízgazdálkodásra és a termés sokszínűsítésére fordíthatják.
mt: Other items on the agenda for Bali include protecting the world's remaining forests and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow less polluting. The UN also hopes to create a fund to help countries affected by global warming deal with the effects. The money could be used to build flood-resistant homes, better water management and diversifying crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "Nigéria korábban bejelentette, hogy a csúcstalálkozó előtti héten tervezte, hogy csatlakozik az AfCFTA-hoz. Az AU kereskedelmi és ipari biztosa, Albert Muchanga bejelentette Benin csatlakozását. ""A biztos azt mondta: """"Még nem állapodtunk meg a származási szabályokban és a vámengedményekben, de a meglévő keretrendszer elegendő ahhoz, hogy 2020. július 1-jén megkezdhessük a kereskedelmet""""."""
mt: "Nigeria had previously announced that it would join the AfCFTA before the summit. The AU's trade and industry commissioner, Albert Muchanga, announced Benin's accession. ""The commissioner said: ""We have not yet agreed on the rules of origin and the tariff concessions, but the existing framework is sufficient to start trading on July 1, 2020."""""
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Az Atlantában töltött időszak során elnyerte a kritikusok elismerését az innovatív városi oktatásért. 2009-ben Nemzeti Szuperintendáns címmel tüntették ki. A kitüntetés idején az atlantai iskolák teszteredményei jelentős javulást mutattak. Röviddel ezután a The Atlanta Journal-Constitution a teszt eredményeivel kapcsolatos problémákat taglaló jelentést tett közzé. A jelentés szerint a teszteredmények javulása irreálisan gyorsan történt, és bár az iskola belsőleg problémákat észlelt, nem tettek lépéseket azokkal kapcsolatban. Ezt követően a bizonyítékok alapján 2013-ben megvádolták Hallt és 34 más oktatási tisztviselőt a tesztek manipulálásával.
mt: During her time in Atlanta, she received recognition from critics for innovative urban education. In 2009, she was named National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, test scores in Atlanta schools showed significant improvement. Shortly thereafter, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report on problems with test scores. The report stated that the improvement in test scores was unrealistically fast, and while the school internally identified problems, they did not take action on them. Following this, in 2013, Hall and 34 other education officials were charged with manipulating the tests.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Az egyik bomba a főkormányzói hivatal előtt robbant fel. Két óra lefolyása alatt további három bomba robbant kormányépületek közelében. Egyes jelentések a hivatalos halálos áldozatok számát nyolcra becsülik, és hivatalos jelentések megerősítik, hogy harmincan sérültek meg, de a végső számadatok még nem ismertek.
mt: One of the bombs exploded in front of the presidential palace. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings over the next two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that thirty were injured, but final casualty figures are unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: A 21 éves Jesus 2017 januárjában csatlakozott a Manchester City csapatához, akik a beszámolók szerint 27 millió angol fontért vették meg őt a brazil Palmeiras klubtól. Azóta a brazil 53 mérkőzésen lépett pályára a klub színeiben az összes versenysorozatban, ahol 24 gólt szerzett.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City in January 2017, reportedly purchased from Brazilian club Palmeiras for 27 million pounds. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 matches for the club in all competitions, scoring 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Ma reggel helyi idő szerint 10 óra körül összedőlt egy hostel Mekkában, az iszlám szent városában. Az épület számos zarándokot szállásolt el, akik a mekkai zarándoklat előestéjén látogattak el a szent városba. A szálláson megszálló vendégek javarészt az Egyesült Arab Emírségek állampolgárai közül kerültek ki. A halálos áldozatok száma legalább 15, és ez a szám várhatóan növekedni fog.
mt: This morning at around 10 am local time, a hostel in Mecca, the Islamic holy city, collapsed. The building housed many pilgrims who were visiting the holy city on the eve of the Mecca pilgrimage. The guests staying at the hostel were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, and this number is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: A két, 1000 font feletti és hozzávetőleg 17 500 mérföld/órás sebességgel repülő műhold 491 mérfölddel a Föld felett ütközött össze. A tudósok szerint az ütközés okozta robbanás óriási volt. Továbbra is próbálják meghatározni az ütközés mértékét, és ennek hatását a Földre. Az Egyesült Államok Védelmi Minisztériumának stratégiai parancsnoka nyomon követi a hátramaradt hulladékot. Az ábrás elemzés nyilvános weboldalon lesz közzétéve.
mt: Two satellites, each weighing over 1000 pounds and traveling at about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the collision caused a huge explosion. They are still trying to determine the extent of the collision and its effect on the Earth. The United States Defense Minister is tracking the remaining debris. The analysis will be posted on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten 2008-ban a 190. helyet foglalta el a 400 leggazdagabb amerikai listáján, 2,3 milliárd dollárra becsült vagyonával. 1950-ben végzett a Virginiai Egyetem Művészeti és Tudományos Főiskoláján, és jelentős adományozója volt ennek az intézménynek.
mt: 2008, Batten ranked 190th on the list of the 400 richest Americans, with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's School of Fine and Applied Arts in 1950, and was a major donor to this institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Kaliforniai kormányzó, Arnold Schwarzenegger, aláírt egy törvényjavaslatot, amely tiltja az erőszakos videojátékok kiskorúak számára történő eladását vagy kölcsönzését. A javaslat előírja, hogy a Kaliforniában eladott videójátékokra egy „18” feliratú matrica kerüljön, és ennek kiskorúak számára való értékesítése esetenként 1000 dollárral büntetendő.
mt: California governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires that a "18" label be placed on all video games sold in California, and that the sale of such games to minors be punishable by a fine of up to $1000.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "Duvall nős, két felnőtt gyerek apja, de nem tett nagy benyomást Millerre, akihez a történet kapcsolódik. ""Amikor kommentárt kértek tőle, Miller azt nyilatkozta: """"Mike sokat beszél a meghallgatás során... Éppen felkészültem, szóval nem igazán hallottam azt, amit mond."""""""
mt: "Duvall is married, father of two adult children, but didn't make much of an impression on Miller, who the story is connected to. ""When asked for comment, Miller said: """"Mike talks a lot during the hearing... I was just getting ready, so I didn't really hear what he said."""""""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Jack Laytonnal, az NDP vezetőjével kedden, a miniszterelnöki irodában folytatott 25 perces megbeszélést követően Stephen Harper miniszterelnök egyetértett azzal, hogy a kormány „tiszta levegőről szóló törvényét” a második olvasat előtt terjesszék elő egy összpárti bizottságnak felülvizsgálatra. ""Layton a konzervatívok környezetvédelmi törvényével kapcsolatos találkozójukon a miniszterelnökkel változtatásokat, a Konzervatív párt környezetvédelmi törvényének „alapos és teljes átírását"""" kérte. "" Mióta a szövetségi kormány beszállt a devonporti (Tasmánia) Mersey kórház finanszírozásába, az állami kormány és egyes szövetségi parlamenti képviselők kritizálták ezt a szerintük a novemberi szövetségi választások felvezetéseként értékelhető lépést. John Howard miniszterelnök azonban azt mondta, hogy ez csak a kórház létesítményeit óvja a tasmán kormány általi visszaminősítéstől, ami miatt további 45 millió ausztrál dollár támogatást nyújtanak."
mt: "On Monday, Stephen Harper, Prime Minister, agreed with Jack Layton, NDP leader, after a 25-minute meeting in the Prime Minister's office, that the government would introduce its "clean air bill" for a second reading before a cross-party committee for review. ""Layton asked for changes to the Conservative Party's clean air bill, and for a "thorough and complete rewrite" of the bill."" Since the federal government has joined the Mersey Hospital in Devonport (Tasmania) in financing, the state government and some federal parliamentary representatives have criticized this as a step that can be interpreted as a prelude to the November federal elections. John Howard, Prime Minister, however, said that this was only to protect the hospital's facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, which would provide an additional 45 million Australian dollars in support."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Mind a ciánsavat, mind a melamint megtalálták azoknak az állatoknak a  vizeletmintáiban, amelyek a fertőzött állateledel fogyasztása után pusztultak el. Az egyetem kutatói szerint a két vegyület reakcióba lép egymással, és a vese működését akadályozó kristályokat képez. A kutatók melamin és ciánsav hozzáadásával a macskavizeletben képződő kristályokat figyeltek meg. Ezen kristályok összetétele megegyezik az érintett háziállatok vizeletében találhatóakkal, infravörös spektroszkópiával (FTIR) hasonlítják össze.
mt: Both cyanide and melamine were found in the urine samples of animals that died after eating the contaminated pet food. The university researchers say the two compounds react with each other and form crystals that interfere with kidney function. The researchers added melamine and cyanide to cat urine and observed the formation of crystals similar to those found in the urine of affected household animals, comparing them with infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "A Xinhua jelentése szerint kormányzati nyomozók szerdán két fekete dobozt találtak. A többi birkózó szintén tisztelgett Luna előtt. Tommy Dreamer azt mondta: „Luna volt az extremitás első királynője. Az első menedzserem. Luna kétholdas éjen hunyt el. Nagyon egyedi volt, pont úgy, mint ő maga. Erős nő.” ""Dustin „Goldust” Runnels megjegyezte, hogy „Luna legalább annyira különc volt, mint én... talán még inkább az... szeretem és hiányozni fog... remélem, hogy most egy jobb helyen van."""""""
mt: "Xinhua reports that government investigators found two black boxes on Wednesday. The other wrestlers also saluted Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first queen of the extreme. My first manager. Luna died on a two-night stand. She was very unique, just like herself. A strong woman." "Dustin "Goldust" Runnels noted that "Luna was just as quirky as I am... maybe even more so... I love and miss her... I hope she's in a better place now.""
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Habár három ember tartózkodott a házban, amikor az autó nekiütközött, egyikük sem sérült meg. A sofőr azonban súlyos fejsérüléseket szenvedett. Az utat, ahol a baleset történt, ideiglenesen lezárták, míg a sürgősségi mentők kiszabadították a sofőrt a piros Audi TT-ből. Először a Great Yarmouthban lévő james Paget kórházban kezelték. Később áthelyezték a cambridge-i Addenbrooke's Kórházba.
mt: Although three people were in the house when the car crashed into it, none of them were injured. The driver, however, suffered serious head injuries. The road where the accident occurred was temporarily closed while emergency crews freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially treated at the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to the Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: A torna 10 órakor kezdődött remek időjárásban, és a reggeli átmeneti szemerkélő esőtől eltekintve tökéletes nap volt a 7-es rögbi számára. Dél-Afrika legjobb kiemelt játékosa a legideálisabb jelzésre indult, amikor kényelmes 26-00 eredménnyel győztek a 5. helyezett Zambia ellen. Míg a déli testvérállamaival vívott küzdelem során meglehetősen gyengének tűnt, a versenysorozat előrehaladtával Dél-Afrika teljesítménye folyamatosan javult. Fegyelmezett védekezésüknek, labdakezelési készségeiknek és kiváló csapatmunkájuknak hála kitűntek, és egyértelmű volt, hogy ez az a csapat, amelyet le kell győzni.
mt: 10 am the game started in perfect weather, and the morning's brief drizzle aside, it was a perfect day for the 7's rugby. South Africa's best player started on the ideal signal, when they won comfortably 26-00 against the 5th placed Zambia. While fighting against their southern brother, they seemed rather weak, but as the tournament progressed, South Africa's performance improved. Thanks to their disciplined defense, ball handling skills and excellent teamwork, they stood out, and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Az elmúlt három évtizedben, annak ellenére, hogy kommunista állam maradt, Kína piaci gazdasággá nőtte ki magát. Az első gazdasági reformokat Teng Hsziao-ping vezetésével hajtották végre. Azóta Kína gazdaságának mérete a kilencvenszeresére nőtt. A tavalyi évben először exportált Kína több autót Németországnál, és megelőzte az Egyesült Államokat, mint ezen iparág legnagyobb piacát. Kína GDP-je két évtizeden belül megelőzheti az Egyesült Államokét.
mt: In the last three decades, despite remaining a communist state, China has grown into a market economy. The first economic reforms were carried out under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown ninefold. Last year, China exported more cars than Germany, and surpassed the United States as the world's largest car market. China's GDP may surpass that of the United States within two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: Hu kijelentette: „Törekszünk arra, hogy a GDP-hez viszonyított fajlagos széndioxid-kibocsátásunkat 2020-ra a 2005-ös szinthez képest jelentős mértékben csökkentsük.” Nem részletezte a csökkentések mértékét, kijelentve, hogy ezek Kína gazdasági teljesítményére alapozva kerülnek majd meghatározásra. Hu arra ösztönözte a fejlődő országokat, hogy „először kerüljék el a szennyezés, majd a feltakarítás régi útját”. Hozzátette: „mindemellett nem kérhetjük tőlük, hogy fejlődési szakaszukat, felelősségeiket és képességeiket meghaladó kötelezettségeket vállaljanak.”
mt: Hu said: "We are striving to significantly reduce our per capita carbon dioxide emissions relative to GDP by 2020, compared to 2005." He did not specify the extent of the reductions, saying they would be based on China's economic performance. Hu urged developing countries to "first avoid pollution, then control it." He added: "We cannot ask them to take on obligations beyond their stage of development, responsibilities and capabilities."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: A Mangola nevű orvosi jótékonysági intézmény, a Medicines Sans Frontieres és az Egészségügyi Világszervezet szerint ez a valaha feljegyzett legsúlyosabb járvány az országban. Richard Veerman, az Orvosok Határok Nélkül szóvivője kijelentette: „Angola az eddigi legsúlyosabb járványa felé tart, a helyzet továbbra is nagyon rossz marad Angolában.”
mt: The Mangola medical charity, the Medicines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organization say this is the worst outbreak ever recorded in the country. Richard Veerman, a spokesman for Doctors Without Borders, said: "Angola is heading towards the worst outbreak ever recorded in Angola, the situation remains very bad in Angola."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: A Legfőbb Ügyész, Kier Starmer QC ma reggel nyilatkozatban jelentette be, hogy Huhne-t és Pryce-t is vád alá helyezték. Huhne lemondott, és Ed Davey országgyűlési képviselő veszi át a helyét a kormányban. Várhatóan Norman Lamb képviselő tölti majd be a Davey által üresen hagyott üzleti miniszteri posztot. A Huhne és Pryce  február 16-án kell megjelenjenek a Westminsteri Alsóbíróságon.
mt: The Attorney General, Kier Starmer QC, announced this morning that Huhne and Pryce will be charged. Huhne has resigned, and Ed Davey MP will take his place in the government. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take over the business ministerial post left vacant by Davey. Huhne and Pryce are due to appear at Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: """Camille Saint-Saens francia operájában egy olyan művészt mutat be """"akinek életét a drogok és Japán iránti imádata irányítják"""". "" Ebből az lett, hogy az előadók kannabiszt szívtak a színpadon, és a színház arra bátorítja a közönséget hogy csatlakozzanak."
mt: "Camille Saint-Saens' French opera portrays a musician whose life is directed by his love of drugs and Japan."  This resulted in the performers smoking cannabis on stage, and the theater encouraging the audience to join in.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: """Leonov, aki a """"11. számú űrhajós"""" néven is ismert, a Szovjetunió eredeti űrhajós csapatának tagja volt."" ""1965. március 18-án elvégezte az első legénységi járművön kívüli tevékenységet (EVA), vagyis """"űrsétát"""", amej során több, mint tizenkét percig tartózkodott az űrhajón kívül."" ""Munkájáért a """"Szovjetunió hőse"""" kitüntetést, a Szovjetunió legmagasabb kitüntetését kapta."" Tíz évvel később ő vezette az Apollo-Szojuz küldetés szovjet részét, ami jelképezte, hogy az űrverseny véget ért."
mt: """Leonov, who is also known as the """"11th cosmonaut"""" was a member of the original Soviet cosmonaut team."" ""On March 18, 1965, he performed the first extravehicular activity (EVA), or """"spacewalk"""", during which he spent more than twelve minutes outside the spacecraft."" ""For his work he was awarded the title of """"Hero of the Soviet Union""", the Soviet Union's highest honor."" Ten years later he led the Soviet side of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, which symbolized the end of the space race."""
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: A balesetet követően Gibsont kórházba szállították, azonban nem sokkal később elhunyt. A 64 éves kamionsofőr nem sérült meg a balesetben. Magát a járművet ugyanazon a napon körülbelül délben (GMT) vitték el a baleset helyszínéről. A balesethez közeli garázsban dolgozó személy szerint „a gyermekek, akik arra vártak, hogy átmenjenek az úton, mind visítoztak és sírtak”. Mind visszamentek oda, ahol a baleset történt.
mt: 64-year-old truck driver Gibson was taken to the hospital after the accident, but died shortly afterwards. The truck was removed from the scene of the accident at around noon (GMT) on the same day. A person working in a nearby garage said that "the children who were waiting to cross the road were all crying and sobbing". They all went back to where the accident happened.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

The truck was removed from the scene of the accident at around noon (GMT) on the same day. A person working in a nearby garage said that "the children who were waiting to cross the road were all crying and sobbing". They all went back to where the accident happened.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Az elvégzett munka alapvetően elméleti volt, de a programot a Nyilas galaxison végzett megfigyelések szimulálására írták. A szakmai csoport a galaxis sötét anyagának árapály-jelensége és a Tejútrendszer sötét anyagának árapály-jelensége közötti hatás meglétét próbálta igazolni. Ahogy a Hold árapályt okozva vonzást gyakorol a Földre, ugyanúgy fejt ki hatást a Tejút a Nyilas galaxisra. A tudósok arra a következtetésre jutottak, hogy a sötét anyag ugyanúgy hat a többi sötét anyagra, mint ahogy a rendes anyag. Ezen elmélet szerint galaxis-szerte a legtöbb sötét anyag a galaxisok körüli egyfajta udvarként van jelen, és sok apró részecskéből áll.
mt: The work was primarily theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations of the Nyilas galaxy. The scientific group was trying to prove the existence of the effect of the Nyilas galaxy's dark matter tide on the dark matter tide of the Milky Way. As the Moon's tidal effect attracts the Earth, so the Milky Way exerts a tidal effect on the Nyilas galaxy. The scientists concluded that dark matter acts on other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter. According to this theory, most dark matter is present in a kind of court around galaxies, and is made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: A vitát a Katrina hurrikán okozta károk enyhítésére és az újjáépítésre fordított költekezés körüli ellentmondások váltották ki; amelyet egyes fiskális konzervatívok humorosan Bush elnök új New Orleans-i gazdaságpolitikájának aposztrofálnak. Az újjáépítési erőfeszítések liberális kritikája az újjáépítési szerződések odaítélésére összpontosított a feltételezett washingtoni bennfentesek számára.
mt: The debate was sparked by the controversy over the spending of funds to alleviate the damage caused by Hurricane Katrina and to rebuild the city; which some fiscal conservatives humorously referred to as Bush's new New Orleans economic policy. The criticism of the rebuilding efforts focused on the awarding of rebuilding contracts to alleged Washington insiders.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."
